英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(55) ... fumigation 烟熏 fumitory 延胡索 fumulus 一层薄雾.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French fumeterre, from medieval Latin fumus terrae 'smoke of the earth' (because of its greyish leaves)

means.word_mean: 1. delicate European herb with grayish leaves and spikes of purplish flowers; formerly used medicinally
